key.name: sink-port
key.summary: SRT binding port to be a sink
key.description: SRT listening port to accept streaming source

key.name: source-port
key.summary: SRT binding port to be a source
key.description: SRT listening port to acquire stream

key.name: external-ip
key.description: When set, the relay will use this IP address in its source and sink URIs. Otherwise, the first available non-loopback IP is used.

key.name: recording-dir
key.description: Where Hwangsae recorder stores its files

key.name: relay-address
key.description: IP address to contact Relay for REST API and streaming

key.name: relay-stream-port
key.summary: SRT connect port for streaming from relay
key.description: SRT port to use to connect to relay for streaming

key.name: relay-api-port
key.summary: REST API connect port to relay
key.description: REST API port to use to connect to relay

key.name: external-ip
key.description: When set, the recorder will use this IP address to build the URL to access the recordings via HTTP.

key.name: recorder-id
key.description: Unique identifier for the Recorder Agent
